saying: There is a point to every encounter.
description: Eunice is a sheep villager with a normal personality. She first appeared in Animal Crossing, but was absent in Animal Crossing: Wild World. She returned to the Animal Crossing series in Animal Crossing: City Folk. Her name is derived from "ewe," a word used to refer to a female sheep. Her Japanese name comes from Mohair, a specific type of fabric made from Angora goat hair.  Her catchphrase comes from the byproduct of young sheep, a lamb, called a lamb chop.
